sync.register.description: Sign up to begin syncing your settings and rules across multiple computers. You'll receive an email with a verification key to activate your account.
sync.change_password.description:
Changing password for {0}
Once changed, your previous syncs will be not be usable; all settings and rules will be re-uploaded.
Other active sessions will be logged out.
sync.verify.description:
Enter verification key sent to {0}
The email will come from jsb@toggleable.com
Remember to check your spam.
sync.verify.verified: Your account has been verified. You can now log in.
setup.please_complete: Please scroll down and click Complete Setup if you're ready to continue.
setup.intro: Your browsing experience just got a whole lot safer and faster. JS Blocker puts you in control of what webpages can do—no more advertisements, no more being tracked, and no more unnecessary clutter. You'll have to reload any pages you already have open for JS Blocker to start taking effect on them. Review privacy policy.
importBackup.title: Import Backup - JS Blocker
importBackup.instructions: The backup will be imported after selecting the file. Donations must be re-verified if clearing settings.
extras.will_unlock_free: Do you wish to unlock JS Blocker without making a donation?
extras.required: You need to unlock extra features in order to do that.
extras.trial.remaining_time: You have {0} left to use JS Blocker's extra features.
extras.trial.expired: Your trial of JS Blocker's extras has expired.
extras.unlock.how: Enter the email address you used to make your donation. Please note that it may take up to 24 hours for it to become active on the server.
extras.unlock.error.email_missing: An email address was not specified.
extras.unlock.error.email_not_found: A donation from that email address was not found.
extras.unlock.error.email_limit_reached: The maximum number of unlocks has been reached for that email address.
extras.donation_thanks: Thank you for your support! Your donation helps keep development going strong. All extra features have been permanently unlocked.
beg.thank_you: Thank you for your continued use of JS Blocker.
beg.why: Please, if you can, show your support by making a donation of any amount. It will give you permanent access to all of JS Blocker's extra features and support development.
update_available.more: Open Safari preferences to update or download from website.
update_available.if_gallery: Important: If you downloaded JS Blocker from Apple's extensions gallery, you won't be able to update to the website version; you'll have to uninstall the current version first. If you don't, an error will occur while installing.
force_click_add_rule: Force click to instantly create a rule.
force_click_add_kind_rules: Force click to instantly create rules.
force_click_host_count_popup: Force click to show each resource.
force_click_host_count_switch: Force click to temporarily switch to showing all resource URLs.
view.page.no_info: Did not receive a page from the active tab.
view.page.from_cache: This page was loaded from the cache and may not contain all of the page's items.
view.page.host.editor.when_framed: Apply rules only when page is loaded within a frame
view.page.host.rules_locked: Rules cannot be created or modified while locked.
view.page.host.disabled: JS Blocker is disabled on this page.
view.page.host.disabled_via_parent: Top page is disabling JS Blocker on this frame.
view.page.host.click_to_edit: Click to switch to edit mode

view.page.editor.kind.title: Select the action the rules will take
view.page.editor.which.title: Select which items to create rules with

view.page.item.info.no_info: No information is available for this item.
frame_blocked: This frame appeared even though you most likely didn't want it to. The page was automatically prevented from loading.
setting_menu.backup_encrypted: This backup is encrypted and requires a password before it can be imported.
setting_menu.export.description: A file named Unknown will be saved to your downloads folder. Feel free to rename it.
setting_menu.export.description.603: A new tab will open where you will be able download your backup.
setting_menu.import.description: You can drag-and-drop the backup file into the space above. The import will start immediately. Donations must be re-verified if clearing settings.
setting_menu.import.alternative.paste: Paste the contents of your backup file below and click Import. Because of how large the backup may be, this can take a few minutes and Safari may appear to hang during the process. Donations must be re-verified if clearing settings.
userScript.attribute.description: Leave an attribute blank to use the script's default value.
setting.syncClientAutoSync.label: Automatically synchronize selected items
setting.syncClientAutoSync.help: You can sync manually at any time by opening the Settings menu and clicking Sync Now.
setting.syncClientSync.what: BETA Securely sync your settings and rules with other computers. Three layers of security maintain your privacy: HTTPS, SRP, and local encryption. Learn more.
setting.syncClientSync.help:
SRP (Secure Remote Password) means your password is never sent to the server.

HTTPS prevents anyone from snooping on your data.

Your email is hashed and not stored in plain text on the server.

Your settings are encrypted locally with a key derived from your password, are unique every time and unpredictable, and cannot be decrypted on the server.

A unique shared-key is generated with SRP at every log in and is never transmitted. It is used to encrypt and decrypt messages to/from the server. This guarantees your communication with the server is unreadable by anyone else, even if HTTPS is ever compromised.

The server is open source.
setting.syncClientSync.settings.label: Settings
setting.syncClientSync.firstVisit.label: Trusted websites
setting.syncClientSync.rules.label: Rules
setting.syncClientSync.snapshots.label: Snapshots
setting.syncClientSync.userScripts.label: User scripts
setting.syncClientRegister.help:
Your email address is used to make sure you're a real person. It is never shared with third-parties.

Your email is hashed and not stored in plain text on the server.

If you forget your password, you can reset it after verifying your email address. Since your settings are encrypted with a key derivied from your password, only newly changed settings will be synced as your previous syncs can no longer be read.
setting.syncClientUseDevelopmentServer.l: Use development server (must be on server's local network)
setting.userScript.cannotUpdate: Can't auto update due to missing download URL (@downloadURL or custom attribute) or @version.
setting.saveUserScript.label: Save user script
setting.saveUserScript.fail: Failed to save user script. Make sure at least a @name and @namespace key are specified.
setting.saveUserScript.unsaved: All unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to switch tabs?
setting.newUserScript.label: Add a new user script
setting.updateUserScriptsNow.label: Update user scripts now
setting.updateUserScriptsNow.help: Only user scripts that have automatic updating or developer mode enabled will be checked.
setting.updateUserScriptsNow.validate.fa: Please wait at least 5 minutes between updates.
setting.userScripts.description: User scripts give you complete control over webpages. JS Blocker supports the Greasemonkey API along with some custom features. Developer mode forces the script to be re-downloaded when loading an affected webpage. Learn more.
setting.newUserScriptStorageItem.descrip: Storage is utilized within user scripts by the functions GM_listValues, GM_getValue, and GM_setValue. All values must be valid JSON.
setting.newUserScriptStorageItem.label: Add a new storage item
setting.alwaysUseTimedDisable.label: Respect time setting when disabling via navigation bar
setting.alwaysUseTimedDisable.help: When unchecked, clicking Disable on the navigation bar will disable JS Blocker until manually re-enabled.
setting.persistDisabled.label: Stay disabled after restarting Safari
setting.disablingReloadsAll.label: Reload all pages after manually disabling/enabling
setting.showResourceURLs.label: Show resource URLs
setting.showHiddenItems.label: Show hidden items
setting.showUnblockedScripts.label: Show scripts that can't be blocked
setting.showUnblockedScripts.help: Only pages loaded after this setting was enabled will show its unblockable scripts.
setting.hideInjected.label: Hide injected helper scripts
setting.showItemDescription.label: Show item description
setting.disableTime.label: Disable for
setting.importSettings.label: Import backup
setting.useSecureSettings.label: Use secure settings
setting.useSecureSettings.help: When enabled, all settings and rules are stored in your macOS keychain. You may incur performance penalties once enabled. This setting's state will not sync with JSB Sync. To prevent unauthorized changes to this setting, enable the locker below.
setting.useSecureSettings.passwordRequir: Because you are using secure settings, a password is required to encrypt your backup.
setting.useAnimations.label: Use animations
setting.largeFont.label: Use large font
setting.createRulesOnClick.label: Create rules without switching to page editor
setting.simplifiedUI.label: Use simplified UI to quickly block/allow all resources
setting.simplifiedUI.help: All resources will be hidden by default when enabled. Open the Page menu to show hidden items. Cannot be used while blocking Unknown Websites.
setting.useSimplePageEditor.label: Use simplified page editor
setting.useSimplePageEditor.help: Hides the advanced options of the page editor until you need them.
setting.showResourceURLsOnNumberClick.la: Temporarily show URLs when clicking number next to item
setting.autoHideWhitelist.label: Hide items allowed by filter lists
setting.autoHideBlacklist.label: Hide items blocked by filter lists
setting.autoHideRule.label: Hide allowed and blocked items that matched a rule you created
setting.autoHideNoRule.label: Hide allowed and blocked items that didn't match a rule
setting.autoHideNoRule.help: Cleans up the page UI by only showing you items are blacklisted, whitelisted, or that you created a rule for.
setting.darkMode.label: Use dark mode
setting.showExpanderLabels.label: Always display hide/show group labels
setting.baseColor.label: Color
setting.language.label: Language
setting.toolbarDisplay.label: Toolbar badge shows number of
setting.updateNotify.label: Notify me about new updates
setting.useLocker.label: Use locker
setting.setLockerPassword.label: Set locker password
setting.setLockerPassword.description: The locker can be used to prevent unauthorized changes to your rules, settings, and other items. A password must be set in order to use the locker.
setting.setLockerPassword.iforgot.instru:
Your computer's user account password is required to perform these steps.

Open your Applications folder and then Utilities.

In here, open the application Keychain Access.

In the application, ensure that login is the selected keychain and then select the Passwords category.

Enter JavaScriptBlocker5 in the search box at the top. There should be a result that starts with Safari Extension.

Double-click the appropriate result, verify that the account is lockerPassword, and then click Show password.

Enter your computer account password to reveal the locker password.

Your locker password is the text within the quotes.

setting.lockerAlwaysLocked.disable.label: Disable or enable JS Blocker
setting.ignoreWhitelist.label: Ignore allowing rules in filter lists
setting.ignoreBlacklist.label: Ignore blocking rules in filter lists
setting.ignorePredefined.label: Ignore built-in filtering rules
setting.allowCache.label: Allow persistent rule actions cache for improved performance
setting.allowCache.help: Disable this to reduce writes to disk.
setting.allowCache.confirm: You have to restart Safari in order for this change to take effect.
setting.blockFirstVisit.description: When visiting an unknown hostname or domain, you can choose to have all of its resources blocked until you deem it trustworthy. Once you do, the resource blocking settings will take control over what gets blocked. Turn this off to allow the simplified allowing/blocking UI to be used.
setting.blockFirstVisit.label: Block all resources on unknown
setting.blockFirstVisit.confirm: Your trusted websites will be reset. Are you sure you want to change this setting?
setting.blockFirstVisit.help:
If enabled, all website resources will be blocked until trusted. This setting determines if you'll be trusting hostnames (www.example.com) or domains (example.com).

Changing this setting will reset your trusted websites.
Show trust notification on unknown websites
setting.defaultRuleList.label: Create rules that last
setting.temporaryRuleTime.label: Keep temporary rules for
setting.temporaryRuleTime.confirm: Your current temporary rules will be cleared.
setting.temporaryRuleTime.help: Temporary rules will always be removed when Safari quits, even if you select a time.
setting.quickDisableTemporary.label: Only temporarily disable when quickly disabling on a page
setting.disableViaParent.label: Disable JS Blocker on frames when disabled on top page
setting.disableViaParent.help: When you disable JS Blocker on a page, this will cause JS Blocker to also be diasbled on frames within that page. You will then be able to enable JS Blocker on those frames individually.
setting.allowAlwaysInPrivate.label: Allow creation of Always rules in private browsing windows
setting.allowAlwaysInPrivate.help: By default, JS Blocker will only create temporary rules when you are in a private browsing window.
setting.defaultRuleDomain.label: Create rules that apply to
setting.defaultRuleDomain.help:
When visiting www.example.com…

Website hostname: Apply rules only to www.example.com

Website domain: Apply rules to example.com and all subdomains within it.
setting.enabledKinds.script.label: Enable script blocker
setting.enabledKinds.frame.label: Enable frame blocker
setting.enabledKinds.popup.label: Enable pop-up blocker
setting.enabledKinds.xhr.label: Enable XHR blocker
setting.enabledKinds.embed.label: Enable embed and object blocker
setting.enabledKinds.video.label: Enable video blocker
setting.enabledKinds.image.label: Enable image hider
setting.enabledKinds.image.help: This is not considered a blocker because Safari cannot prevent images from being downloaded. This means the requests for images that are to be hidden are still made and any information along with the request is still sent.
setting.alwaysBlock.script.label: Block scripts from
setting.alwaysBlock.frame.label: Block frames from
setting.alwaysBlock.popup.label: Block pop-ups to
setting.alwaysBlock.popup.help: When set to Rules and ask when needed, a prompt will appear on the webpage for every pop-up that does not match a rule. From there, you wil be able to block or allow the pop-up.
setting.alwaysBlock.xhr.label: Block XHRs to
setting.alwaysBlock.xhr.help:
When set to Rules and ask when needed, a notification will appear on the webpage for every XHR that does not match a rule. From there, you wil be able to block or allow the request.

You can hold the option key to block or allow all visible XHR notifications instead of clicking them one-by-one.

Pending notifications will appear in the popover with an orange background.

You'll also be able to edit any query parameters by double clicking them.
setting.alwaysBlock.embed.label: Block embeds and objects from
setting.alwaysBlock.video.label: Block videos from
setting.alwaysBlock.image.label: Hide images from
setting.showPopupBlockedNotification.lab: Show a notification when a pop-up is blocked
setting.showPlaceholder.frame.label: Show placeholder for blocked frames
setting.showPlaceholder.embed.label: Show placeholder for blocked embeds and objects
setting.showPlaceholder.video.label: Show placeholder for blocked videos
setting.showPlaceholder.image.label: Show placeholder for hidden images
setting.synchronousXHRMethod.label: Synchronous XHRs
setting.synchronousXHRMethod.help: Synchronous XHRs prevent webpage interaction until completed. The standard XHR notification will not work for these requests due to this; you wouldn't be able to allow or block it. If set to Invasively ask, a confirm dialog will popup blocking all other interactions with Safari until you pick an action.
setting.synchronousXHRMethod.confirm: A JS confirmation dialog (like this one) will appear whenever a synchronous XHR that does not match a rule occurs. Are you sure you want this to happen?
setting.showSynchronousXHRNotification.l: Show a notification when a synchronous XHR occurs
setting.filterLists.validate.fail: Enter a valid URL starting with http:, https:, or ftp:.
setting.filterLists.description: Filter lists act as JS Blocker's blacklist and whitelist. They block all of the unwanted content on websites you visit. You can view the rules contained in them from the Rules tab, but you won't be able to edit them.
setting.filterLists.confirm: This list is already included in Fanboy's Ultimate filter. Are you sure you want to enable it?
setting.filterLists.confirmSocial: This list is already included in Fanboy's Ultimate filter and Fanboy's Annoyances. Are you sure you want to enable it?
setting.filterLists.ultimate: Fanboy's Ultimate filter includes EasyList, EasyPrivacy, and Fanboy's Annoyances (which itself includes Fanboy's Anti-social). Those filter lists have been individually turned off as they are no longer needed.
setting.filterLists.annoyances: Fanboy's Annoyances filter includes Fanboy's Anti-social. That filter list has been individually turned off as it is no longer needed.
setting.filterListLastUpdate.description:
Filter lists were last updated {0}.
The next update will occur in {1} days, {2} hours, {3} minutes.
setting.updateFilterLists.label: Update filter lists now
setting.updateFilterLists.validate.fail: Please wait at least 5 minutes between updates.
setting.importRulesFromFour.label: Import rules from JSB 4
setting.importRulesFromFour.prompt: Paste the exported backup below. This can be either a full backup or just the backup containing your rules. You must have made a donation or unlocked features without contributing.
setting.autoSnapshots.description: Keep track of all changes made to your rules. Snapshots let you easily revert to different rule sets or recover just a few. You'll never have to worry about messing up your rules again. You can acess your snapshots from the Rules menu.
setting.autoSnapshots.label: Automatically create a snapshot when rules are modified
setting.snapshotsLimit.label: Store up to
setting.clearSnapshots.label: Delete all snapshots
setting.blockReferrer.label: EXPERIMENTAL: Enable full referer blocking
setting.blockReferrer.confirm: This setting has no effect yet. If this feature is ever implemented in the future, it will suddenly begin to work if enabled. Are you sure you want to change this to enabled now?
setting.focusNewTab.label: When a new tab opens, make it active
setting.enabledSpecials.description: These features will appear as a blocked item under the header Other Features. You can create rules for them just as you would any other item.
Prevent links on webpages from sending referers
setting.enabledSpecials.alert_dialogs.la: Display alert messages within the webpage instead of a popup dialog
setting.enabledSpecials.anchor_titles.la: Show URL path when hovering over links
setting.enabledSpecials.contextmenu_over: Prevents webpages from disabling or using a custom context menu and potentially prevent other extensions from creating menu items
setting.enabledSpecials.window_resize.la: Prevents webpages from resizing the window and creating new windows with a custom size
setting.enabledSpecials.popups.label: Prompt when a webpage tries to open a new tab or window
setting.enabledSpecials.popups.help: May help prevent pop-unders and pop-ups by letting you confirm wether or not the new page is allowed to open. Please be aware that even if you click OK to allow the pop-up, Safari's built-in pop-up blocker may still block it.
setting.enabledSpecials.inline_script_ex: Prevent inline scripts from being executed
setting.enabledSpecials.environmental_in: This feature may break website functionality. Websites won't be able to detect if you have flash installed.
setting.enabledSpecials.page_blocker.lab: Enable ability to block pages from loading
setting.enabledSpecials.page_blocker.blo: JS Blocker prevented this page from loading.
When set to ask, a confirmation dialog will appear anytime a webpage attempts to turn a canvas image into a URL. Whenever possible, you will be able to see the generated image in the background in a sandboxed environment. Should you choose to disallow the creation of the URL, a randomized string will be passed instead. Test it out.
Ask once per host per session
setting.enabledSpecials.font.label: Webpage font
setting.enabledSpecials.zoom.label: Webpage zoom
lockerInfo.importBackupSettings: Import settings backup or restore default settings
recommend_reload.title: Page Reload Recommended
recommend_reload.body: Some resources were forcibly blocked because the page was hidden while it loaded. Reload the page if it isn't functioning as expected.
first_visit.title: All Resources Blocked
first_visit.body: All resources will be blocked until you decide to trust this {0}.
first_visit.blocked.body: All resources on this {0} are blocked because you deemed it untrustworthy.
first_visit.blocked.help: Clicking Trust will let your settings take over and decide what should be blocked.
first_visit.unblock_more_info: Trusting will let the "Block [resource type] from" settings take control over of what gets blocked. You can still create rules for resources on untrusted websites.
settings.locked: Settings cannot be modified at this time.
settings.safari_restart: You have to restart Safari in order for the new settings to take effect.
create_rule.domain_info:
Start a domain with . to include all subdomains (e.g. .example.com will apply rule to example.com, www.example.com, etc.).

Pages must begin with ^, end with $, and be a valid regular expression. The entire URL will be tested against this (e.g. http://www.example.com/hello_world).
create_rule.rule_info:
This determines which resources will be affected.

Enter * or leave blank to match all resources.

Include protocol matching by separating them with a comma followed by a | and then the domain (e.g. http:,https:,ftp:|.google.com).

Start a domain with . to include all subdomains (e.g. .example.com will match example.com, www.example.com, etc.).

Start with a ^ and end with $ to use regular expression matching.
rules.no_kinds_selected: You have to select at least one kind to create a rule for.
rules.filter_lists.updating.description: Performance may be impacted until completed.
snapshots.name: Name
snapshots.open_to_restore: Open a snapshot to restore its rules.
special.anchor_titles.allowed: Don't show link href on hover
special.alert_dialogs.blocked: Show alerts in a webpage notification
special.contextmenu_overrides.allowed: Allow context menu to be disabled
special.contextmenu_overrides.blocked: Force context menu to be available
special.contextmenu_overrides.blocked.de: Extensions won't be able to add menu items
special.popups.notification.title: Pop-up Blocked
special.canvas_data_url.prompt: This page may be attempting to use canvas fingerprinting to track you. If there is an image displayed that looks suspicious or out of place, click Cancel. If there isn't, use your best judgement. If you see the Union Flag or UN, click OK.
special.canvas_data_url.prompt_old: This page may be attempting to use canvas fingerprinting to identify you. If this is unexpected and you are not on a site you trust, click Cancel.
special.canvas_data_url.subsequent: Subsequent attempts from {0} will be handled automatically.
special.canvas_data_url.subsequent_sessi: Subsequent attempts from {0} will be handled automatically until you restart Safari.

user_script.add_success: User script successfully added to JS Blocker.

feedback.includes:
Anonymous settings and console messages included.
Email required to receive reply to feedback.
feedback.feedback_success: Your submission has been received. Thanks for the feedback!
feedback.please_wait: Please wait at least 5 minutes between submissions.
feedback.error.offline: The feedback server appears to be offline right now. Please try again later.
feedback.console_attached: Your console report is ready to be submitted.
